long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DailyDota2.com provides live-stats for Dota 2 matches by adding graphs as overlays to an embedded Twitch stream. Feel free to use this extension if you'd like to get notified as soon as live-stats are available for the channel you selected on Twitch.
